message: Let's be fair, 60% for me, 40% for you. We both get a good amount.
I understand you want a larger share Alice, but consider the time pressure.  This offer gets us both a significant sum.
You're right about time pressure, but I still think I deserve the larger share. Meeting you halfway from my initial offer.
Alice, this is a strong offer considering the time pressure and the fact that I'm bearing the brunt of the inflation. Let's close this deal and both walk away with a good amount.
I see you're trying to negotiate, but I still think I can get a better deal. Inflation is on my side, after all.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering a fair 50/50 split.  Accept this now before inflation eats away at my share even further and forces me to propose a worse deal for you!
